ModMetaData.name: ModCheck
ModMetaData.author: Nightinggale
ModMetaData.description:
Adds more patching operations for modders and makes RimWorld start up faster due to faster patching.
For players: Load this before Core If all mods keep ModCheck up to date, then this mod is not even needed. However if mods use multiple versions (like just after ModCheck has been updated), then loading the newest first becomes important, hence this mod and the need to load first.
For modders: Follow the link for a guide on how to make your mod use the included features.
